channel.title: Java classes
channel.description: how do i change the blue java.classes to the normal classes like this. because i only see china now. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2isfgpf.jpg[/img]

item.title: Java classes
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The ‘blue java classes’ are called CLASS files, they are compiled JAVA files (The normal files, you can edit). When you compile the java files, the compiler produces class files which are java byte code (Which java reads in order to run your code, this is why you need to compile).

There is something called decompiling which reverses this process and changes byte code into java code. There are many decompilers out there.

http://java.decompiler.free.fr/

Is an example, it has an easy to use GUI so I’ll leave the rest up to you.

Read full topic
